author: jukka
msg: JCR-2119: Method to create default RepositoryConfig from just the repository directory
The install() methods will automatically create the repository directory and configuration file if they do not already exist. The create() methods will fail with an exception in the same situation.

author: oching
msg: o set root project path in release descriptor

msg: Added support for both SSL and TLS at the same time, added debug option
